name: Monster Power
overview: Sunday, sunday, SUNDAY! It's ground pounding, heart-stopping, quarter mile mayhem, as "Big Daddy" Don Garlits and Dan "the Snake" Purough chase 3-time top fuel eliminator World Champion, Shirley "Cha-Cha" Muldowney down the quarter mile of death in their seven-thousand horsepower nitro-burning suicide machines as they shake hands with the Devil when they scream through the burning gates of Hell. This game will sell you the whole front-row seat but you'll only need the edge! Be there!
